hr.fer.oop.lab4.prob1

Class EquilateralTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.oop.lab4.prob1.GeometricBody
      • hr.fer.oop.lab4.prob1.EquilateralTriangle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EquilateralTriangleFast

    public class EquilateralTriangle
extends GeometricBody
    Represents Equilateral triangle. Triangle has base parallel with x-axis.
    Author:
    Jurij Kos

        Parameters:
        topX - x-axis coordinate from top of the triangle
        topY - x-axis coordinate from top of the triangle
        sideLength - length of side

    • Method Detail

      • hasPoint

        public boolean hasPoint(int x,
                        int y)
        Description copied from class: GeometricBody
        hasPoint checks if Geometric Body has point on that pixel so drawOnPicture method can paint point. Returns true if it pixel is in geometric body.
        Specified by:
        hasPoint in class GeometricBody
        Parameters:
        x - position of Point on the x-axis.
        y - position of Point on the y-axis.
        Returns:
        true if it has point ,false if point is not inside geometric body.

        Returns:

        public int getTopX()
        Returns:
        x-axis coordinate of top-most point.

      • getTopY

        public int getTopY()
        Returns:
